h2: Search the Questions Below or Ask Us Your Own
s-0-0: You register on Betnomi.com to get unlimited access to all the products available on the website. Registration allows you to set an account totally free of charge and without any obligations. Use the account to manage your bets and personal data. You can make bets after you refill your account.
s-0-1-t: How can I register on your website?
s-0-1: Registering on our website is fast and simple. Just click the ‘Create account’ button in the top right corner. Upload all the necessary documents straight into your personal profile to make your gambling journey quick and smooth. We also recommend looking through the rules before you get underway.
s-0-2-t: Why do I need to provide my personal data?
s-0-2: Your personal data is required to grant you full access to our products. Your Betnomi account is managed just like a bank account, and we need to know your first name and last name, as well as your current residential address. By entering your date of birth, you verify that you are of legal age to use Betnomi services. It is important for us to have your email address so that if you forget your password or want us to send you notifications, we will be able to get in touch with you via email.
s-0-3-t: Why is it necessary to provide passport details?
s-0-3: This is done solely for security purposes. You will be able to make deposits and withdrawals only after you upload an identification document.
s-0-4-t: Where can I see my account number?
s-0-4: To see your account (ID) number, go to the My Profile page and choose the My Data section
s-0-5-t: Do I undertake any obligations by registering on the website?
s-0-5: No. Your registration does not bind you in any way and you are not obliged to make deposits regularly or place a certain number of bets. However, by registering you agree to our General Terms and Conditions.
s-0-6-t: Can I change my personal data after registration?
s-0-6: You will be unable to change your basic data, including your first name, last name, date of birth, your account currency, or the country settings. Nevertheless, you will still be able to change other data after the registration. In particular cases, for example, if the personal data was filled in incorrectly, Betnomi will verify and accept changes to your basic data in the event you submit a relevant document.
s-0-7-t: Do I have to deposit right after the registration?
s-0-7: No need to deposit immediately. You can do it whenever you like by using the ‘Deposit’ option.
s-0-8: We currently support Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Bitcoin SV, Ethereum, Tron, USDT, Doge, Dash, and Litecoin. More are coming!
s-0-9-t: Which is the minimum withdrawal amount?
s-0-9: The minimum amount you will be able to withdraw depends on the blockchain/withdrawal method you select. For Bitcoin, the minimum withdrawal amount is $10 and for all other withdrawal methods, the minimum is $5, or their equivalent in any other fiat currency.
s-0-10-t: Are there any fees imposed on withdrawal?
s-0-10: Betnomi does not charge any fees for withdrawals. However, some of them come with a small fee to process transactions on the blockchain (miner fees). These fees are dynamic, so we are unable to quote a fixed amount.
s-0-11-t: What should I do if I have forgotten my password or username?
s-0-11: The fastest way to reset your password is to click the ‘Forgot Password?’ link. Unfortunately, in some rare cases (e.g. if the email address you’ve provided is wrong or if there are any technical inaccuracies), it can’t be restored. Anyway, if you are having trouble, don’t hesitate to contact our support team.
s-0-12-t: Can anyone else get access to my account?
s-0-12: This might happen if you leave your page using the exit ‘X’ button instead of logging out.
s-0-13-t: What should I do if another person learns my password or username?
s-0-13: Contact our support team straight away. We will block your account and sort out the issue as soon as possible.
s-1-0-t: How do I place a bet?
s-1-0: To start, log in with your username and password. Select one or several bets from our line-up and click on an estimated outcome. Your bet will then appear in the bet slip on the right-hand side of the page. Next, specify the amount you wish to stake and your preferred type of bet (Single, Express, System, or Chain). Finally, you can either confirm the bet or cancel it. Keep in mind that our General Terms and Conditions do not permit the cancelation of any bets once they have been placed.
s-1-1-t: What are the types of bets?
s-1-1: On Betnomi, you can choose among different types of bets. Starting with one prediction, you can use the Single bet option; with two or more predictions, you can place Express bets; with three or more predictions, you can place a System or Chain bet. All you have to do is to select the desired option.
s-1-2: A Single bet is the simplest form of betting. You predict an outcome, specify the desired stake and place the bet. If your prediction is correct, you win the bet. The winnings are calculated by multiplying the odds by the stake.
s-1-3-t: What is an Express bet and how is it calculated?
s-1-3: An Express is a bet consisting of two or more events where none of the events should lose. If even one loses, then the whole Express will collapse. Total odds are calculated by multiplying the odds of all the individual predictions.
s-1-4-t: What is a Chain bet and how is it calculated?
s-1-4:
A Chain bet is a combination of Single bets on events independent of each other. You choose the order of the bets included in the chain and the unit. The unit stake is placed on the first selection as a single. If this generates a return, the unit stake is deducted from the winnings and placed on the second selection, and so on until the chain is complete or all funds are lost. In case there are not enough funds left to cover the unit stake, the total remaining balance is staked and the chain continues.

For example:
Leg Event Stake Odds Outcome
1 event $3 2odd. Win
2 event 1.5 Win
3 event 2 Lose
4 event 3 Win
5 event 1.5 Lose

As a result of the first event ~ $6 is generated, from which ~ $3 is transferred to the next event as the bet amount. The other ~ $3 is transferred to the so-called chain account. From the second event being won ~$4.50 is generated, from which ~ $3 is transferred as a bet amount for the next event, and the remaining ~$1.50 is transferred to the chain account to total ~ $4.50. As the third event is lost, ~ $3 is taken from the chain account for the fourth event, and only ~ $1.5 remains in the account. After the fourth event is won ~ $9 is generated, ~ $3 of which is transferred as the bet amount for the fifth event, and ~ $6 is added to the chain account that comes to a total of ~ $7.50. The fifth event is lost. This means that the winnings of this chain are ~ $7.50, i.e. the same amount as in the chain account.
s-1-5-t: What is a System bet? How is it calculated and how much is the minimum bet amount?
s-1-5: System is a bet that consists of at least three events. The program creates possible combinations of the events you have selected. For example, if you select a 2/5 system, it means that at least 2 out of 5 picks must be correct for the bet to win. The minimum amount of each bet depends on the selection of the system.
s-1-6:
A handicap is a head start given to a selection expressed in goals/points/sets/frames, etc., depending on the type of the competition. The handicap is offered by the bookmaking company and can be ‘positive’ (1), ‘negative’ (-1), and ‘zero’. For example, if you made a bet on Handicap 1(2) on a football match, this means you allowed Team 1 a 2-goal head start.

  • If the match ends 1-1, then adding the handicap will produce a score of 3-1 and the bet will win
  • If the match ends 0-3, then adding the handicap will produce a score of 2-3 and the bet will lose.
  • If the match ends 0-2, then adding the handicap will produce a score of 2-2 and the bet will result in a push (stakes returned).
  • If the handicap is negative, you need to subtract rather than add.


Here are a few other examples of a handicap

Bet W1 Handicap (-1) can win only when the home team wins the match by two goals.

Bet W2 Handicap (1) can win only when the away team does not lose the match (draw or victory of the away team).

Bet X Handicap (1) can win only when the home team wins the match by one goal (or when the away team loses by one goal).

Bet X Handicap (-1) can win only when the home team loses the match by one goal (if the away team wins by one goal).

Bet W1 Handicap (-2) can win only when the home team wins the match by three goals. Bet W2 Handicap (2) can win only in the following result of the match:

A draw

The victory of the home team by one goal

Any victory by the away team.

Bet X Handicap (2) can win only when the home team wins by two goals.

Bet X Handicap (-2) can win only when the home team loses by two goals (or the away team wins by two goals).
s-1-7: A Hattrick bet means that one of the players of the two teams should score three or more goals during the match.
s-1-8-t: What do W1/W2, W1/X, X/W2, and other bets mean?
s-1-8: This type of bet is halftime/fulltime betting, where the first symbol shows the result of the first half, while the second symbol shows the result of the game. For example, a W1/W2 bet means that the first team won the first half but the second team won the game. W1/X bet means that the first team won the first half, and the overall game ended in a draw.
s-1-9-t: When I try to place a bet I get a message saying that I have exceeded the winning limit. How high is the winning limit?
s-1-9: Betnomi reserves the right to set various betting limits for all events, markets, and selections. You will be informed of any limits when you place your bet. There are various reasons for setting a winnings limit, including the supply and demand for a bet. Please note that winnings limits may also be lowered for a short time when odds are updated.
s-1-10: The maximum winnings for one customer over a 24-hour period is €100,000. If the bet comes with a bonus and the winning amount exceeds €100,000, the bonus is not paid.
s-1-11-t: What are the maximum odds for Express or System bets?
s-1-11: The maximum odds for Express or System bets is 1000. Bets that exceed 1000 are calculated at 1000 odds.
s-1-12-t: How can I remove selections chosen by me from the coupon?
s-1-12: Selections can be removed before the placement of the bet by clicking directly on the “X” button on the right side of the coupon.
s-1-13-t: I have placed a bet by mistake. Is it possible to cancel it?
s-1-13: Оur Terms and Conditions, do not allow to cancel bets once they have been placed. A bet is considered to be placed as soon as it is displayed in your betting account in the My Bets section. Before you confirm a bet, you can cancel it in the bet slip and thus avoid placing it. However, once you have confirmed the bet in the coupon, your bet is accepted and can no longer be canceled.
s-1-14-t: How can I check whether my bet was accepted?
s-1-14: As soon as you have confirmed the bet in the coupon by pressing the ‘Make a Bet’ button, you will receive a confirmation that the bet has been placed successfully. Each bet that you place will appear in your betting account in the ‘Bet History’ section.
s-1-15-t: In what cases are the bets canceled by the operator?
s-1-15: Bets are canceled if there is an inaccuracy in the names of players or teams, if wrong odds are offered, if a wrong total is quoted, if a wrong handicap is quoted, etc. In these instances, the bets are void.
s-1-16-t: What happens if the match is postponed/canceled?
s-1-16: The bet is settled as void depending on the individual sport Rules. In the case of an Express or System bet, the selection is considered void.
s-1-17-t: How is a football match settled if the match ended in extra time or in a penalty shoot-out?
s-1-17: All football bets are settled only for the 90-minute result (full-time), excluding extra time and penalty shoot-outs, unless otherwise stipulated by Betnomi.com. According to our rules, full-time includes any stoppage time during the 90 minutes.
s-1-18-t: How are yellow cards given to a player settled?
s-1-18: The second yellow card leading to the player’s dismissal is considered to be red, which means the player has one yellow card and one red card.
s-1-19-t: How is a basketball game settled?
s-1-19: Overtime counts for all bets on the game unless stated otherwise, with the exception of the bets on the winner of the match, where a draw is offered in regular time.
s-1-20-t: How is a hockey match settled?
s-1-20: The bets on National and International Ice Hockey championships are settled within the official time of the matches unless otherwise stated.
s-1-21-t: How is the bet settled if a tennis player refuses to continue the game?
s-1-21: If a tennis player refuses to continue the game (or is disqualified), they are considered to be defeated in all the following games and sets, and settlement is made according to the subsequent results.
s-1-22-t: Do I get back my money if the match doesn’t take place as planned?
s-1-22: If the match is interrupted for more than 15 hours, all bets are returned, except for those, where the result was determined.
s-1-23-t: Why is the settlement of my bets delayed?
s-1-23: The settlement is usually made as quickly as possible. The settlement of online games is made during the game; the settlement of offline games is made as soon as a game ends, regardless of the bet type. However, settlement can be sometimes delayed due to various reasons: the absence of information about the results, the same event with different information on various websites, technical problems, etc.
s-1-24-t: What should I do if my bet is settled incorrectly?
s-1-24: Just contact the Live Support department. Our folks will check your bet, recalculate it if needed and your winnings will be added to your account.
s-1-25-t: What is the minimum number of minutes an interrupted match is played to be considered completed for betting purposes?
s-1-25:
Matches are considered to be completed for betting purposes, if they have been interrupted and not finished in the official time specified in points 6 and 7 of the Terms and Conditions, and if the time played is at least the following:

Soccer – 90 min
Futsal (duration 2 x 20 minutes.) - 35 minutes
Futsal (duration 2 x 25 minutes.) - 45 minutes
Basketball NBA (National Basketball Association) – 43 min
Euro basketball – 35 min
Hockey NHL (National Hockey League) – 55 min
Bandy – 60 min.
Eurohockey – 50 min
American football – 55 min
Baseball - 5 periods (innings)
Handball – 50 min.
s-1-26-t: What happens to my bet if a match or event is postponed?
s-1-26: If the event does not take place as scheduled or if the official score of the match is not announced and the match is not resumed within 24 hours, all bets will be declared void, refunded, and transferred to your account. If the match is included in your Express Bet or System Bet, the odds for this selection will be settled at 1.0.
s-1-27-t: How can I check the result of my preferred game?
s-1-27: As we settle bets according to the data of the official websites, you can find the list of the websites in point 18.3 of the Terms and Conditions.
s-2-0-t: Why was the acceptance of my bet delayed or interrupted?
s-2-0:
This may occur because of the following reasons:

  • Technical problems (interruption of the broadcast during (live) games, software failure, power cuts, etc.).
  • Busy time periods.
  • High level of interest in a sports game/match or an event.
  • Congestion of a network provider.
  • Speed of completion of the sport or event. For example, a tennis game is an event with a very fast outcome, the quantity of bets is high, therefore changes in odds are frequent.
s-2-1: This can happen only if you pressed the button twice. Please be careful when placing bets.
s-2-2-t: Why were the odds on an event canceled ahead of start time?
s-2-2: Suspension of odds could happen for any of the reasons in 2 above.
s-2-3-t: How accurate is the data given on live matches on your website?
s-2-3: We work hard to ensure that the information is up to date and correct. However, it should only be considered as a guide when betting.
s-2-4-t: Why is my limit on the (live) bet reduced?
s-2-4: Betnomi reserves the right to reduce the limit of players or block them from using its services. Betnomi doesn’t owe an explanation regarding these decisions.
s-3-0-t: How do I create a Casino account?
s-3-0: Playing in Betnomi Casino requires a Betnomi account. If you do not yet have one, just click on the ‘Register’ button on the Casino page and follow the simple registration process.
s-3-1-t: How do I deposit in the online casino?
s-3-1: Once logged in, press the ‘Deposit’ button on the top of your screen and select your desired amount and payment method.
s-3-2-t: How can I see the games I played last?
s-3-2: Once logged in, you can view the Last Played Games using the appropriate icons on the bottom of the Casino page.
s-3-3-t: What is a Random Number Generator?
s-3-3: As the name suggests, a Random Number Generator (RNG) is a program that produces random results in software-based casino games. It is used to ensure fair gaming for all users. Random outcomes mean that the game is not rigged to influence any player in particular. Rather, they present a leveled ground for all the players to gamble online.
s-3-4-t: What kind of games can I play in Betnomi Casino?
s-3-4: Betnomi offers a wide selection of games, including a myriad of 3D games, table games, slot games, and live games like Blackjack, Roulette, Baccarat, and Bet on Poker.
